column1: On January 23 Palau starts implementing health screenings at the Airport and the Seaport for symptomatic passengers and crew who may have traveled through areas affected by the 2019 novel coronavirus (n-CoV).
Taiwan fines coronavirus patient $10,000 for 'hiding' illness https://asia.nikkei.com/Spotlight/Virus-outbreak/Taiwan-fines-coronavirus-patient-10-000-for-hiding-illness …
